member.name: T:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab
member.summary: Helper class that provides common values for the cron expressions.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Minutely
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every minute.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Hourly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every hour at the first minute.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Hourly(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every hour at the specified minute.
member.param: The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Daily
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every day at 00:00 UTC.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Daily(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every day at the first minute of the specified hour in UTC.
member.param: The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Daily(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every day at the specified hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Weekly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at Monday, 00:00 UTC.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Weekly(System.DayOfWeek)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at 00:00 UTC of the specified day of the week.
member.param: The day of week in which the schedule will be activated.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Weekly(System.DayOfWeek,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at the first minute of the specified day of week and hour in UTC.
member.param: The day of week in which the schedule will be activated.
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Weekly(System.DayOfWeek,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every week at the specified day of week, hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The day of week in which the schedule will be activated.
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Monthly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at 00:00 UTC of the first day of month.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Monthly(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at 00:00 UTC of the specified day of month.
member.param: The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Monthly(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at the first minute of the specified day of month and hour in UTC.
member.param: The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Monthly(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every month at the specified day of month, hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Yearly
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year on Jan, 1st at 00:00 UTC.

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Yearly(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year in the first day at 00:00 UTC of the specified month.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Yearly(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year at 00:00 UTC of the specified month and day of month.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).
The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Yearly(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year at the first minute of the specified month, day and hour in UTC.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).
The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Yearly(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns cron expression that fires every year at the specified month, day, hour and minute in UTC.
member.param: The month in which the schedule will be activated (1-12).
The day of month in which the schedule will be activated (1-31).
The hour in which the schedule will be activated (0-23).
The minute in which the schedule will be activated (0-59).

member.name: M:Prom3theu5.CronBasedHostedServices.CronTab.Never
member.summary: Returns cron expression that never fires. Specifically 31st of February
